mapper.select: SELECT pc.PROCESS_CD, pc.PROCESS_NM, pc.PROCESS_US, pc.PROCESS_BG, pc.PROCESS_EQ, pc.PROCESS_PD FROM PROCESS pc ORDER BY pc.PROCESS_CD
SELECT pc.PROCESS_CD, pc.PROCESS_NM, pc.PROCESS_GC, pc.PROCESS_CC, pc.PROCESS_US, pc.PROCESS_BG, pc.PROCESS_EQ, pc.PROCESS_PD FROM PROCESS pc WHERE pc.PROCESS_CD = #{pccd}

choose.when: SELECT DISTINCT cc.COMMON_CC, cc.COMMON_NM FROM COMMON_CODE cc WHERE cc.COMMON_GC = #{COMMON_GC} ORDER BY cc.COMMON_NM
SELECT DISTINCT cc.COMMON_CC, cc.COMMON_NM FROM COMMON_CODE cc JOIN MATERIAL mt ON cc.COMMON_CC = mt.MATERIAL_CC WHERE cc.COMMON_GC = #{COMMON_GC}
choose.otherwise: SELECT DISTINCT cc.COMMON_CC, cc.COMMON_NM FROM COMMON_CODE cc JOIN PRODUCT pd ON cc.COMMON_CC = pd.PRODUCT_CC WHERE cc.COMMON_GC = #{COMMON_GC}

mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT
mt.MATERIAL_CD, mt.MATERIAL_NM
pd.PRODUCT_CD, pd.PRODUCT_NM
FROM
MATERIAL mt
PRODUCT pd
WHERE
mt.MATERIAL_CC = #{pdcc}
pd.PRODUCT_CC = #{pdcc}
SELECT DISTINCT eq.EQUIPMENT_CD, EQ.EQUIPMENT_NM FROM EQUIPMENT eq JOIN PRODUCT pd ON EQ.PRODUCT_CD = PD.PRODUCT_CC WHERE EQ.PRODUCT_CD = #{pd} AND EQ.EQUIPMENT_US = 1
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO PROCESS (process_cd, process_nm, process_gc, process_cc, process_pd, process_eq, process_us, process_bg, process_wr, process_wd) VALUES
(#{item.process_cd}, #{item.process_nm}, #{item.process_gc}, #{item.process_cc}, #{item.process_pd}, #{item.process_eq}, #{item.process_us}, #{item.process_bg}, #{item.process_wr}, #{item.process_wd})
